Vehicle.Name: D-4S Projection Platform
Vehicle.Description: [H3]D-4S Projection Platform[h3] [P]After the success of the D-4, Icnom realized that the large generator necessary for the shield system could be used to power other devices. This craft is marketed as a way to keep building facades "intact" while under repairs, but many underworld elements quickly realized that a portable, large-scale hologram could be used to mask illicit activities.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Holographic Camouflage[b]: As a maneuver, driver may extend the craft's holographic field to display a preprogrammed building, structure, or other object of silhouette 4. if vehicle moves, the illusion persists, but is obvious to observers that it is a hologram.

Vehicle.Crew: One driver, one operator, one gunner
